Container.Name: quartz
Container.Overview:
Quartz is a fast, batteries-included static-site generator that transforms Markdown content into beautiful websites. Key features: Full-text search, Graph v isualization, Wikilink support, Beautiful and fast interface
This version allows you to mount a directory containing your markdown files, and it will generate a website from it. You can have your own quartz code at /mnt/user/appdata/quartz it will be copied to the container before starting quartz.
For example, if you only want to change quarts.config.ts, you can create the file at /mnt/user/apppdata/quartz/quartz.config.ts and quartz will use it. If you want your own quartz repository, you can clone your repository at /mnt/user/appdata/quartz and quartz will use it.
Using your own quartz repository: # git clone https://github.com/josecoelho/quartz.git /mnt/user/appdata/quartz
Container.Description: Quartz turns your Markdown notes into a beautiful website.
